title: The Cost of Victory
goal: Show the immediate aftermath of the battle, the physical and emotional cost of victory, and the lingering presence of the blight's influence.
stakes_shift: Victory is achieved, but at a significant cost, and the larger threat of the Shadow Blight remains, reminding them this was only a skirmish.

bridge.from_prev: Valerius has been defeated, the immediate battle concluded.
bridge.to_next: The heroes must now address the humanitarian and political consequences of their actions, beginning the process of healing.

sections.title: Silence and Smoke
sections.intent: Depict the immediate, quiet aftermath of the battle, the destruction and exhaustion.

scenes.summary: The chamber falls silent, filled with smoke and the lingering scent of corruption, the group exhausted but alive amidst the devastation.
scenes.outcome: The immediate battle ends, leaving the group exhausted and the chamber devastated.

sections.title: Lingering Taint
sections.intent: Show that while Valerius is gone, the blight's influence is still present and requires attention.

scenes.summary: Though Valerius is defeated, the chamber still pulses with residual blight energy, hinting at the pervasive nature of the darkness.
scenes.outcome: The blight's influence lingers, proving its deeper roots than just Valerius.

sections.title: The Price Paid
sections.intent: Show the physical and emotional toll on the characters, and potential casualties.

scenes.summary: The group tends to their wounds, both physical and emotional, acknowledging the sacrifices made and the heavy cost of their victory.
scenes.outcome: The group suffers injuries and emotional toll, recognizing the high cost of their victory.
